definitions.definition: arrange in or allocate to grades; class or sort.
examples: they are graded according to thickness

definitions.definition: give a mark to (a student or a piece of work).
examples: score, mark, assess, judge, evaluate, appraise the essays have been graded

definitions.definition: pass gradually from one level, especially a shade of color, into another.
examples: the sky graded from blue to white on the horizon
synonyms: pass "the colors grade into one another"

definitions.definition: reduce (a road) to an easy gradient.
